page.title: 16A DOLPHINTON HOUSEWIFE
page.content: My home life is quite routine. I am married with a teenage son and daughter. My day starts around 6am when I awake the family, prepare breakfast of fruit juice and porridge or cereal with milk, followed by bacon and egg and/or toast. After they hace all gone out to work, I wash the dishes, switch on the washing machine, and tidy the house. Then I walk to the local shop to collect the daily newspaper and the bread. When I return I prepare a midday snack for my son. who works on a nearby farm. I also work as a prt-tinme clerkess with a local haulage firm, two days a week. I like garening and house plants, and we have a greenhouse which takes up a lot of our spare time. We have a Jack Russell dog which I take out for a walk evert day. I enjoy knitting and I am a member of the W.R.I.
